title: BRIEF-Spartan Energy announces Q3 financial and operating results | Reuters

organizations.name: united kingdom | united states  thomson reuters

text:
BRIEF-Spartan Energy announces Q3 financial and operating results Wed Nov 9, 2016 8:10am EST [ - ] Text [ + ] 
Nov 9 (Reuters) - Spartan Energy Corp 
* Qtrly average production of 12,429 boe/d (91% oil and liquids), representing a 55% percent increase over Q3 of 2015 
* Spartan Energy - Revising 2016 exit guidance from 12,500 boe/d to 13,500 boe/d and average production guidance from 10,700 boe/d to 11,200 boe/d 
* Reducing 2016 capital expenditure budget from $68 million to $66 million 
* Spartan Energy Corp. announces third quarter financial and operating results Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Â© Thomson Reuters 2016 All rights reserved.
